createWrapper

public static javax.management.NotificationListener createWrapper(javax.management.NotificationListener listener)
                                                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Creates a wrapper of a NotificationListener so that it can be registered in an MBean of a remote JMX Agent and the local wrapped NotificationListener receive their notification.
